features_evolved.impact: Codebase simplified, Zen Mode is now a core UI capability available to all users.
Practice flow friction reduced, Auto-start logic integrated as a standard feature.
Marked as stable, providing a consistent guided learning experience.
Gamification features are now permanent, boosting user engagement.
Started collecting high-fidelity pitch accuracy data for future algorithm tuning.
Dynamic challenge scaling based on performance (perfect streaks) is now functional.

technical_improvements: Fixed critical async generator closure bug in the practice engine loop.
Refactored note-stream pipeline to support dynamic context and options via getters.
Corrected the session runner orchestration in PracticeStore to ensure audio processing begins.

verification_summary.frontend_verification: UI functional, onboarding and main views verified via Playwright screenshots.
